recipes.methodOfCooking:
1. Cook the spaghetti according to the instructions on the packet.
2. Heat some oil in a large frying pan over medium heat. Add the onion and garlic and cook until softened.
3. Add the beef mince and cook until browned.
4. Add the canned tomatoes and simmer for 20 minutes.
5. Serve the sauce over the cooked spaghetti.

1. Preheat the oven to 200°C (180°C fan)/400°F/gas mark 6.
2. Season the chicken with salt and pepper, and stuff the cavity with the lemon halves, garlic, and rosemary.
3. Rub the olive oil all over the chicken.
4. Roast the chicken for 1 hour and 20 minutes, or until the juices run clear when you pierce the thickest part of the thigh with a skewer.
5. Serve with your favorite side dishes.
